类的使用
Object.Object

  • 使用Object的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    ControlLogic  
    Object  
    Physics  
    View  

    • ControlLogic中Object的使用

      参数类型为Object的ControlLogic中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void TacticsLogic.AutoCommand(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used set Command order to guide missles which have command guide function by AI
      static void TacticsLogic.AutoHeadTurning(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is turn the helmet aimer by AI
      void ControlLogic.CheckInfraredLock(Object object)
      This method is used to detect a object by Infrared system, which will be called by GameWindowController
      static ExternalLoad TacticsLogic.ChooseMinRangeWeapon(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used to choose a proper weapon to use the best weapon is the weapon whose envelop covered the target and has the min lauch range
      static double TacticsLogic.EstimateMissleLauchEnvelope(ExternalLoad missle, Object target)
      calculate the missle launch envelope, which is helpful to choose the proper weapon by ai
      static boolean TacticsLogic.IsEnemy(Object A, Object B)
      this method is used to determind the relationship between A and B
      void ControlLogic.RadarScan(Object object)
      This method is used to detect a object by radar, which will be called by GameWindowController Also it can implement the helmet aiming of Radar Guide missle if aircraft has such function

    • Object中Object的使用

      Object中Object的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  Aircraft
      aircraft is the most important object in this game it has mainly four forces: thrust, lift, gravity and drag It has several subSystems: Radar, Helmet, Engine, guns and ExternalLoads
      class  Explosion
      Create an explosion object with a max radius it start with a radius of 30 it will expanding until the radius get into the max value objects entering this object area will be damaged
      class  ExternalLoad
      ExternalLoad object, which is carried and can be launched by other object it has the similar physical properties as the aircraft it can be rocket, bomb, missle and so on missles have guide function, which can lead them fly to target automatically guide methods include Infrared, Radar(Semi-active or active(not yet implemented)) and Command
      class  GunBullet
      GunBullet object, which is launched by gun it only have gravity and initial speed the object inside bullet's hit radius will get gun damage
      声明为Object的Object中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Object ExternalLoad.CapturedObject 
      返回Object的Object中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object ExternalLoad.getCapturedObject() 
      参数类型为Object的Object中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ExternalLoad.CreateExplosion(Object object)
      Create explosion by its tnt mass and explosion range, the fuze will work when target is inside its explosion range + hit radius
      void ExternalLoad.setCapturedObject(Object capturedObject) 
      参数类型为Object的Object中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Explosion(Object owner, double tNTMass, double explosionRange)
      Constructor

    • Physics中Object的使用

      声明为Object的Physics中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Object InfraredModel.InfraredTarget 
      private Object RadarModel.owner
      Attributes
      private Object InfraredModel.owner
      Attributes
      类型参数类型为Object的Physics中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.ArrayList<Object> RadarModel.radarTargetList 
      返回Object的Physics中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object InfraredModel.getInfraredTarget() 
      返回变量类型为Object的类型的Physics中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.util.ArrayList<Object> RadarModel.getRadarTargetList() 
      参数类型为Object的Physics中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static int Locating.AttackDirection(Object A, Object B)
      this method is to calculate the direction A attack on B it is useful for AI control
      static boolean DamageModel.ExplosionDamage(Explosion explosion, Object object)
      ExplosionDamage event is caused by Explosion the damage area is explosion range, every in this area will be damaged the damage value is determind by tnt mass of explosion the closer to the explosion center, the greater the damage value is
      static double Locating.getDistance(Object objectA, Object objectB)
      get the distance two object
      static double Locating.getDistanceX(Object objectA, Object objectB)
      get the distance on x axis of two object
      static double Locating.getDistanceY(Object objectA, Object objectB)
      get the distance on y axis of two object
      static double Locating.getRelativeAngle(Object objectA, Object objectB)
      this method calculate the relative direction of B compare to A this means draw a straight line from A to B, set A as the center, the direction of this line is what we want
      static int Locating.Guiding(Object A, Object B)
      Guide method is important for missle guide and AI aiming its an application of getRelativeAngle
      static boolean DamageModel.GunDamage(GunBullet gun, Object object)
      GunDamage event is caused by gun bullet the damage area is basic hit area, no friend damage if the piercing armor ability of gun is better than armor of object, the damage value is gun power, else just 1
      void RadarModel.helmetGuide(Object object, double helmetDirection, double detectRange)
      give the missle the target detected by helmet aimer
      void InfraredModel.InfraredDetect(Object object)
      Detect an object by infrared system, the infrared missles lock or IRST the target need to be covered in the infrared detect envelop and is alive
      static boolean Locating.isAInRadiusOfB(Object A, Object B, double Radius)
      this method is to check whether A is locate an area created by B this area is a circle with a radius, B is the center
      static boolean Locating.isAInSquareOfB(Object A, Object B, double dx, double dy)
      this method is to check whether A is locate an area created by B this area is a square with a length and width, B is the center
      static boolean DamageModel.KneticEnergyDamage(ExternalLoad load, Object object)
      KneticEnergyDamage event is caused by ExternalLoad the damage area is basic hit area, no friend damage the KneticEnergyDamage is calculate according to knetic energy
      void RadarModel.radarDetect(Object object)
      Detect an object by radar system the target need to be covered in the radar detect envelop and is alive also it will implement the function of radar guide for radar missle some radar has look down limitaion, it can't detect target below them for more than a certain angle
      void RadarModel.RadarGuide(Object object)
      give the radar guide missle the target detected by radar
      参数类型为Object的Physics中的构造器 
      构造器和说明
      InfraredModel(Object owner, Radar myRadar)
      Constructor
      RadarModel(Object owner, Radar myRadar)
      Constructor
